item.description: This is a nice place for a Sunday morning walk. Afterward, we’ll go for lunch. Join us! No charge for walk. For info, call Gail 860-582-8229. Sponsored by Singles Social Connections. Directions: I-84 to 72E or Rt. 9 to 72W, Exit 7 Corbin Avenue, take Rt. 372W to 1st light, turn right onto West Main Street, at 4th light turn right onto Park Place at Walnut Hill Park sign, go to end, turn right and follow road around to other side of park. We’ll meet in 2nd larger parking lot on right.

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Walk & Lunch
